name: py-thinc
description: Thinc: Practical Machine Learning for NLP in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cymem
dependencies.description: Manage calls to calloc/free through Cython.

dependencies.name: py-preshed
dependencies.description: preshed: Cython Hash Table for Pre-Hashed Keys.

dependencies.name: py-blis
dependencies.description:
Cython BLIS: Fast BLAS-like operations from Python and Cython, without
the tears

dependencies.name: py-wasabi
dependencies.description: wasabi: A lightweight console printing and formatting toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-srsly
dependencies.description: srsly: Modern high-performance serialization utilities for Python.

dependencies.name: py-catalogue
dependencies.description: catalogue: Super lightweight function registries for your library.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-plac
dependencies.description: The smartest command line arguments parser in the world.

dependencies.name: py-pathlib
dependencies.description:
Object-oriented filesystem paths. Attention: this backport module isn't
maintained anymore. If you want to report issues or contribute patches,
please consider the pathlib2 project instead.

dependent_to.name: py-spacy
dependent_to.description:
spaCy is a library for advanced Natural Language Processing in Python
and Cython.
